mp.headerDesc: Configure AI models and prompts for each memory stage. These presets are used for retrieval, summarization, archiving and other automated memory tasks.

mp.injection.desc: Control the format of memory data injected into chat AI conversations
mp.retrieval.desc: Control memory retrieval AI behavior parameters
mp.retrieval.autoTrigger.desc: Automatically run retrieval AI on each user message
mp.macroRef.desc: The following macros can be used in preset prompts and injection templates. They will be replaced with actual data at runtime:
